message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am interested in purchasing the product, and I would like to propose a price of $10500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm still looking to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $10800.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a price of $10600 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm still not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $10900.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I am committed to finding a fair price for both parties. I would like to propose a price of $10750 for the product.
I appreciate your continued efforts, Bob! I'm still not willing to go above $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $10975.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I am willing to compromise further. I would like to propose a price of $10800 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $10950.
I appreciate your patience and willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to pay $10850 for the product.
